problem_text_cn: 如图,∠AOB=60°,点P是∠AOB内的定点且OP=3,若点M、N分别是射线OA、OB上异于点O的动点,则△PMN周长的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, ∠AOB = N_0, point P is a fixed point in ∠AOB and OP = N_1, if points M and N are the moving points on radials OA and OB that are different from point O, then the minimum value of the perimeter of △PMN is ()
raw_answer: 解:作点P关于OB的对称点P′,点P关于OA的对称点P′′,连接P′P′′与OA,OB分别交于点M与N则P′P′′的长即为△PMN周长的最小值,连接OP′,OP′′,过点O作OC⊥P′P′′,由对称性可知OP=OP′=OP′′,∵OP=3,∠AOB=60°,∴∠P′=∠P′′=30°,OP=OP′′=3,∴P′C=\frac{3√{3}}{2},∴P′P′′=3√{3}；故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查利用轴对称求最短距离问题；通过轴对称将△PMN周长转化为P′P′′的长是解题的关键
